Talents.Name: Frugality
Talents.Description: When deployed, <Operator Name>'s ammo-based skills have a 20% chance to not consume the corresponding ammo for each shot; Other Sniper Operators' ammo-based skills have a 20% chance instead (only the highest effect of this type will be applied)

Talents.Name: Vestiges of Vacation
Talents.Description: ASPD +8, when there is a water terrain on the battlefield, the effect becomes ASPD +12
